text: Carlo Giuffrè (3 December 1928 - 1 November 2018) was an Italian actor and a stage director. He appeared in more than 90 movies between 1942 and 2002. He was born in Naples. He was known for his roles in The Railroad Man, The Girl with the Pistol, and Poker in Bed. In 1984 Giuffrè won a David di Donatello for Best Supporting Actor for the comedy movie Son contento, directed by Maurizio Ponzi.
